Ano: 2018

Sinopse: A comedy about a family that's crazy for Christmas. Except for the 16-year-old daughter, Nicky. Her family's over-the-top Christmas celebrations have made her life miserable. When her long-distance boyfriend decides to visit for the holidays, she's determined to spare him her family's Christmas obsession, so she hires actors to play her parents and stages a fake Christmas dinner in the empty house next door. What could go wrong?
